name: Chain Reaction Free
description:
Chain Reaction is an addictive game that is very simple: Clear the level of bombs. To do so you are given explosions that must cause chain reactions with the bombs on the level. The less explosions you use the more points you get.

Features:

- Fun to watch Explosions
- Keep track of your high score
- 50 levels of gameplay
- 3 levels of difficulty (easy, medium, and hard)
- Automatic Game Saving
- UPDATES forever! We planning on adding new gameplay features often so this game will never be old

***This is an ad-supported application***

Developer notes:

I've read the comments and e-mails people sent. Thank you very much for all your suggestions!

Here is the current list of features i'm working that will be released in the near future:

1. Sound and Music
2. Leaderboards
3. More Backgrounds
4. Bonus points, and better points system.

If anyone has any feature requests (i'll gladly add them to my list) or comments please e-mail me at felix@mobiledevgroup.com
